review: Dear guest. We regret the inconveniences during your stay, and especially in regards to the comfort of the extra bed. We will take note of your complaint. On the other hand, we want to inform you that it was possible to request a kettle at the reception. With regard to the rest of the issues that you detail, we will send your comments to the Hotel Management. Thanks for sharing your opinion.

title: Avoid !!
review: Week away with my partner. We wanted a cheap week away from the snow in England. This is a nice budget hotel. We weren’t happy with our room as right beside the entrance but we were moved when we complained. Room was basic but clean, maid service daily and all staff quite friendly.  We did feel the hotel catered for the older traveller, entertainment every night, twice it was Bingo and once ballroom dancing, so not really our cup of tea.  There is a small pool but I could just stand in shallow end so not really suitable for children or non swimmers. Plenty of sun beds on the sun terrace. Town is quite a walk but there is a free bus there and back. Food basic but plenty of choice, avoid the bacon at breakfast, no where does a cooked breakfast like we do in England. Nice break in…

title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS!
review: I’m not one to complain online, even when I find something to be very bad, but this place exceeded any expectation of what horrendous is defined by.  I stayed here for a week with my Father, and I mean it when I say that I would’ve preferred to sleep on the streets.   My Dad is 55, and was the youngest tourist for miles apart from myself. Bugs and flies infested the room, no matter how hard we tried to get rid of them. Our toilet exploded and flooded the room with faeces on our first night, and we hadn’t even used it. It then happened again on day 4, and day 6. Each time, we had to wait over an hour to have someone come look at it.  I’m all for people having fun, but we were kept awake on 3 separate occasions by the people in the room above banging and moaning. The times they…

title: Its not the Ritz, and I'm glad it's not
review: Dear guest We regret that there was not a single thing you liked about our hotel. We can understand that some inconveniences may have occurred, and we hope that we have been able to solve them diligently, but you tell us some aspects of the hotel that leave us in a very bad position and with which we can not agree. In any case, and on behalf of the entire hotel, especially from our staff, we apologize for any inconvenience we may have had some responsibility for. Friendly regards.

title: Very Pleasant
review: I love this little hotel, it is perfect!  The staff are friendly and helpful, from the charming David on Reception to the bar and restaurant staff who are so good at what they do.  The hotel is in a quiet, pleasant area of Puerto de la Cruz, a short walk to the tourist areas, bars, restaurants and seafront, but far enough away for it to be peaceful.  On my last visit the hotel was full of Spanish pensioners on their subsidised holidays i guess, but they were a friendly crowd and I had fun at the evening entertainment.  I only booked room and breakfast this time but the offering was excellent, lovely fresh breads, fruits, cereals as well as cooked items such as bacon (Spanish), baked beans, fried potatoes, omelets, fried eggs, sausages, yogurts and pastries.  although I must say…

title: AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE
review: Dear guest. We appreciate your opinion very much, and are happy to recieve your comments and suggestions. We will take them in consideration. Thanks for your confidence, and kind regards.

title: Our stay
review: Over the past couple of years I have become a regular visitor to this hotel. I originally booked at random because the price was low but keep coming back as the staff look after me so well. This place is basic and other hotels may have more extensive facilities but what you do get here is excellent value for money. The meals are of a good standard and I'd describe the breakfast as being excellent. The hotel whilst not on the seafront is only a short distance away from all local amenities with a free bus provided during the day. In any case local taxis are very cheap. The rooms are always kept very clean. The main attribute that this place has is the staff who will look after you in any way they can. I'm slightly miserable to be going home tomorrow but look forward to my next…

title: Another nice stay
review: I fly home tomorrow after another very nice stay at this hotel. The staff here are wonderful and always make me feel welcome, which is one of the main reasons I come back. I accept that it is a fairly basic place but the price reflects this. As I've said in other reviews you will get excellent value for money. The meals on offer are pleasant, the breakfast being particularly good. The bar area is a very pleasant way to spend an evening. I was all inclusive and indulged in the gin, vodka and beer and can vouch for its quality. I've already booked to come back again in May and look forward to it.

title: Very nice holiday
review: Dear guest. Thanks for visiting us again, and for such a kind review. Reviews like yours encourage us to continue working to improve every day.  Our staff will be glad to know that they have been actively involved in your stay to make it more pleasant and comfortable. Best regards, and see you next May.

title: Great staff, enjoyable much needed holiday
review: We stayed her for one week....bit daunting with the reception on the 5th floor..but got used to it...room very clean...staff very friendly ..room cleaned daily and towels changed daily too..the resident cockerel you do get used to...plenty of choice of food .all in all a lovely week at the perla and would certainly visit again

title: Celebrity get me out of here
review: Dear guest. It was a pleasure for us to welcome you in our hotel. We would be glad to see you soon again. Thanks for sharing your opinion, and best regards,.

title: Knock it down
review: After reading some reviews, the Hotel Perla exceeded our expectations. The hotel is in a lovely setting with much greenery around it. It has a good roof terrace for sunbathing. The staff were very friendly and helpful throughout our stay even helping us to check in for flights and printing off our boarding cards. The restaurant offered a good variety of food. We don't drink much,just to say that our wine bill for the week was cheaper than our 'expensive' meals on the Ryan air flight back to England. Puerto de la Cruz is quite 'hilly' and the longish walks could be difficult for some, however the hotel runs a free return courtesy bus to the town/seafront. For the price we paid for the complete holiday, we were extremely pleased. The temperature even reached 27 C on one day with…

title: Awful
review: We went here for a long weekend and while I was only expecting 3star, what we got was dreadful.  Had read the reviews and it sounds OK but the staff were rude,  the place was dirty. There's a pool and a sun terrace but no shop,  jacuzzi,  or anything else.  They also tried to charge for the whole holiday on the way in and on the way out even though we had prepaid at a reputable travel agent.  The food on offer was bad and not much choice.  The bar tender was really nice,  shame it's not as described.  No gardens,  just small strip of gravel with some trees on.  Place is tatty and can easily be missed.

title: Good value for money
review: Dear guest. Thank you for your opinion. We regret that you did not have a pleasant experience in our hotel, but we regret even more that we could not help you and make your stay more enjoyable. However, we are surprised with your claim of our cleaning service, as this is one of our most important efforts, and most of our clients praise the work of our cleaning staff. We apologize if this was not your case. Friendly regards.

title: Clean and  Basic
review: Well located hotel with easy access to main town allowing return to the hotel for quiet relaxation.    Hotel has good facilities and friendly staff who was happy to assist in facilitating the disability needs that one of our party had.  Hotel has nice pool area, supervised with a life guard, roof terrace sun area allowing for good views over the resort.  Rooms are adequate with balconies or patios, clean and fresh.

title: Good value for money
review: Dear guest. We thank you for your confidence in our hotel, and are happy to read that you and your friends had a nice stay. We wish you happy Christmas, and a happy New Year.

title: Pleasant albeit a way out.
review: Three star hotel with mixed reviews, our expectations were fairly low on a cheap November package holiday, but grabbing a relaxing pre Christmas break I was happy with this hotel. It is quirky and basic, but clean and the staff are friendly especially if you try your pidgin Spanish. The room is somewhat shabby but we overlooked that. The tv only shows Spanish channels and there is a hairdryer, very quiet fridge and a safe in the room. No aircon but there is an overhead fan. On arrival I asked for a kettle - it was there by the time we entered the room - but no cups so you need to ask for these as well. Take your own coffee bags and milk then you're set for a decent coffee every morning. The machine coffee in the restaurant is vile. We asked for a quiet room and were given 427.…

title: First holiday alone
review: I loved this Hotel all the staff were lovely the food was brilliant something there for everyone. Luckily for me the weather was also spot on sun every day except one on my 10 day holiday thank you so much hotel perla for making my first holiday alone brilliant missing you already

title: Lovely in November!
review: Dear guest. Thank you for your time writing this nice review. It make us always happy to read such kind comments about our staff, who works hard but with great enthusiasm. We`ll forward your comments to all of them. Thanks for choosing us, and we hope to see you next year. Kind regards, and we wish you a happy Christmas.

title: Charming place , fantastic staff
review: Just returned from a lovely relaxing all inclusive holiday at the Perla. The staff are wonderful. Everything is spotlessly clean. The breakfast is amazing! The food on the whole was excellent for a three star hotel, although maybe would not be acceptable for veggies. Very large comfy room, we stayed on the third floor overlooking the wall at the front of the hotel. Hourly free bus to and from the Martinez shopping mall. La Perla is built into the side of a steep hill, it's an easy walk down to the sea, but far too steep to enjoy walking back up, so we either caught the hotel bus or got a cab back for around 6 euros.  We enjoyed our visits to Loro Parque; 32 euros each and the botanical gardens; 3 euros each. All in all we had a great time and met some amazing people! Thank you x

title: Dont listen to bad reviews!
review: Dear guest. Thanks for sharing your experience. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay in our hotel, and in Puerto de la Cruz. We hope to see you soon again. Keep well, and kind regards.

title: Holiday
review: After a week away for the first time in Tenerife, i booked into this place. On turning up at stupid am (around 05.00 am on the Saturday morning , me and my partner were greeted by David. Who then proceeded to show us into the closed restaurant and told us to place our stuff down, and then to a table where they had a cold meat salad meal ready. I thought this was a nice touch and was very impressed by this gesture. Then after food showed to our room. Rooms and hallways around hotel are immaculate and although the rooms are a bit dated they are spotless. Booked all inclusive for the week. Not expecting a variety and thinking it was going to be same sort of food everyday , was pleasantly surprised. This is by no means the sort of food you would expect in a posh hotel but tasty all…

title: Pleasant Hotel for the price,good value
review: Got back a week ago from a 8 day stay at this hotel.My partner and I were a little weary when we arrived at the hotel around 9pm after being dropped off at a roundabout a 5 min walk away from hotel,soon to realize that this is nearest drop off point for a coach to get close.The room was lovely and clean,very roomy for 2 people and was cleaned every day.All staff were pleasant although I think reception staff did struggle to communicate sometimes with their English,it wasn,t a major problem we got there eventually.Food in the restaurant was nice and quite varied,deserts were lovely.We went away with the intention to relax and we certainly did,weather was exceptional to be fair and the sun loungers were great on the roof terrace where we never had a problem getting any every…

title: Ignore the bad reviews!!!
review: Dear guest. Thanks for this nice review. It makes us happy to read that you had a great time in our hotel. We hope to welcome you soon again. Best regards, and keep well.

title: All Inclusive Break
review: just back from  a 7 day stay at the Perla Hotel was a bit weary after reading some the bad reviews my advice is ignor them! Many on here are very quick to forget its a 3 STAR hotel and you will have paid 3 STAR price. Yes the building and the rooms need an update most of the staff aren't great at speaking English. The room was cleaned everyday and fresh towels left everyday. As regards to the food breakfast was pretty decent lunch was a bit hit and miss and as regards to dinner there was always a great selection of food and you order your drinks soft and alcohol this is brought to your table by a waiter/waitress (never had this before in any all inclusive hotel) to be honest the hotel was much better than I was expecting by some the bad reviews on here I am pretty fussy and I…

title: Holiday
review: Dear guest. Thank you for your nice review. It´s a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thanks for choosing us, and we hope to see you soon again. Best regards.

title: Short break away
review: Very relaxing holiday, rooms cleaned everyday. Staff very friendly throughout the hotel. Plenty of choice for meals. The hotel is within a residential area which is quiet, on an evening. If your looking for nightlife you would need to go into the centre which is not too far away. Very relaxing holiday.

title: Could be a little 'Gem' with a few 'rule' changes :D
review: The first thing I would like to say after reading some terrible reviews for this hotel is that some people seem to forget that it has 3 stars and it is what it is! The All Inclusive meals are not ‘a la carte’ (oddly enough, because that is not what you have paid for!), but there is plenty of variety and you will certainly not go hungry, and I say this as quite a picky eater. Another plus is that you get table service for your drinks at lunch and dinner, something that I personally have never experienced in a 3 star All Inclusive Hotel so big thumbs up to the management on that one, it’s a nice touch :D. The staff  are all very friendly and as helpful as they can possibly be. I personally did not experience anyone being grumpy or bad mannered (except maybe the lady in the…

title: Fantastic Holiday
review: Dear guest. Thanks for this objective and comprehensive review. Be sure that your comments and suggestions will be sent to the Management. Best regards, keep well, and we hope to see you on your next stay in Puerto de la Cruz.

title: Pete
review: We have just returned after spending 10 days, arrived late at night and was checked in straight away reception staff very good, Food was plentiful even if you went just before service ended always something to eat, breakfast was good a selection of cereals bacon and eggs ect ( tasted like bacon) and if you like cake the selection was brilliant. The walk to town is not to long but the walk back is up hill and lots of steps if you have mobility problems possibly not for you but the free bus runs on the hour, The old town is beautiful. Staff were very friendly anyone who says they are rude we didn't experience this I think if your polite to them they will be to  you, the pool is vey deep and not suitable for children who cannot swim. Rooms were cleaned every day and the whole hotel…

title: Out of way
review: Dear guest. Thanks for letting us know your experience in our hotel. It makes us happy to read that you had a great stay, and would like to welcome you again in the future. Best regards.

title: Nice hotel, lovely staff
review: Food ok, it’s situated in a hilly area. Third bed is a pull out bed, with a inch or so mattress. You can feel the bars underneath.  Would be better if it had three beds. Didn’t sleep at all on pull out bed. Weather not to good. Very near to mountain Region.

title: Tracy
review: Hotel is clean.  Room cleaned everyday. Most of the staff are very friendly Food is very repetitive fish, veal, pickled rabbit, some sort of chicken.  All salad seems to b kept in vinegar(That's what it taste like) Lots of different bread to choose from which was just aswell. Food was probably ok but I didn't like anything. They cater for Spanish and Germans very well. Not so much the English. It is in a quiet area (but that's y I booked it) Free shuttle bus into town, takes about 10mins. So all in all its ok

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear guest. We'll take advice of your comments about our buffet. Thanks for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. We hope to see you again soon. Best regards

title: Not suitable for people with limited mobility
review: After reading some of the reviews, I was quite worried to see what we had booked!  When we turned up I was pleasantly surprised! The coach dropped us off at the back entrance. I had already read reviews advising that the reception was on the 5th floor and a sign on the door confirmed this on arrival.   We were checked in straight away and the receptionist asked us if we wanted lunch as it was almost over. He said it would be best to leave the bags with him and go and eat which we did as we were starving.   The room probably needed updating but the positives were the size of the room, the balcony and the cleanliness. The cleaners really did do an amazing job! Some reviews say that towels weren't cleaned, but in our room a sign in the bathroom said something like "help save the…

title: Not the best or not the worst
review: Dear guest. Thank you for your review. It´s a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks for choosing us, and we hope to see you soon again. Best regards.

title: Ok Hotel
review: Arriving after 21:30 we had missed the dinner sitting but the hotel offered late food which although wasnt the full buffet service was enough to see us through to the following breakfast service this was unexpected but welcome snack. The man on reception did not seem to happy to help when a safe key was requested.the room was of a reasonable size and apart from dust and old cobwebs on higher parts of the walls and on the ceiling was reasonably clean. The beds and pillows were a bit on the firm side but slept ok most nights other than the cockerels making a noise early some mornings and on one night noisy English guests. Pool was reasonably clean but the steps into the pool would not be suitable for anyone with mobility problems as there is a big drop from the bottom step to the…

title: Loved it
review: I was put off this hotel when I read the reviews and thought "what did I just book" but my stay at this hotel was brilliant. The staff were friendly and very energetic. The food was brilliant with lots of different varieties. You could take what you wanted and how much you wanted as it is a buffet. hotel rooms were very clean as they were cleaned everyday. The hotel is quite isolated but there is a free shuttle bus that takes you into town and there is a supermarket 10 min walk up the road. The barmen were very generous with their alcohol and the cocktails were lovely. Entertainment was really good and I've had the song "kutchy wa" in my head for over month lol. The pool was a good size and there is a sauna which isn't opened until winter time because it's too hot during the…

title: Great Stay
review: Dear guest; We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Best regards.

title: AVOID - MONEY WENT MISSING
review: Have just arrived home after my second stay this year. Once again I was met with a warm welcome by staff. Granted this hotel does not have some of the bells and whistles that other more expensive places have but what it does represent is excellent value for money. The rooms are spotless and beds are comfortable. Nearby is the amazing Loro Parque which I highly recommend. The meals here are basic but always tasty. The bar is very pleasant and you will never have to wait long. The quality of the beer and gin being very good on all inclusive  (didn't really try anything else) I really enjoyed my stay and look forward to returning in February.

title: Dirty and mean
review: Dear guest;  Thank you for your review, we are glad to read that you have enjoyed your holiday with us. We look forward to your return in February. Best Regards.

title: Fab holiday
review: I really didnt know what to make of this hotel until money went missing from our room.  First thoughts were;  Nice surroundings  Decent size room (old fashioned & no air con but good size)  Food very basic and not much choice - same evening and night  Cleaner a bit slap dash.  Bar man (old bald guy) extremely rude and nasty - when asking for a drink he said one drink only. We only had one drink and he then came over to our table to check. You pay for an all inclusive holiday what does it matter if you have more than one drink at a time? You have prepaid for it?  Then he started shouting at us in Spanish....if you ask me this is extremely rude and very embarrassing.  However it gets worse when i emptied my pockets and left 30 euro on the side the cleaner had been in and the money…

title: Quiet and friendly
review: This hotel is in a quite location , the food is different every night but the breakfast it always the same thing , it’s a long way away from the south airport but is close to the town which you can get a free bus to

title: Massive Disappointment!!!!!!!
review: Dear guest. Thanks for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. It was a pleasure for us to welcome you in our hotel. Kind regards, and we hope to see you soon again.

title: Don't waste your money!
review: The staff is horrible!! There is hardly no food in the restaurant!! There is no wristband all inclusive, every time you want to get something from bar you have to show this stupid paper!! The swimming pool is the size of my shed and it's placed on the roof!! It smells in the rooms, there is no air conditioning, the beds are hard, the bath tub is so small I can't even fit in it and I am 170cm!!! Never going back here, this is my first day and already want to go back home from this bulls*it!!!!

title: Hotel not near the beach. .
review: Dear guest. We are sorry that you are so upset of our services and installations. and we regret that you weren't correcly informed about what's included in our establishment. Thanks for your opinion.

title: OK
review: I booked this holiday being very mixed as had read a mixture of reviews so wasn't sure what to expect.  After arriving my first thought was yep the receptionist don't seem to like the British that much.   Positives or hotel;  Bar staff friendly and very efficient Room nice size  Powerful shower  Every room has balcony  Ok location if you enjoy walking  Lovely views from the pool and sunbathing area.  Plenty of sunbeds  Rooms cleaned everyday   Negatives of the hotel: Food terrible no vegetarian dishes what so ever. All you can eat is salad and chips be prepared.  In restaurant they serve you your drink. Very slow service and sometimes you don't get one at all NOT IMPRESSED.  Same food every single day no different choices - disgusting.  Ants in the bathroom - lovely!  No aircon…

title: Room far too hot
review: Currently staying here for two weeks no air con in room none of us have slept simply too hot my little boy is currently now poorly.pool is unsuitable for small children sun beds aren't on the same level.cant wait to Ho home having to get a taxi everyday into town as nothing to do for son in hotel. Room is cleaned everyday and food is what you would expect won't be booking again. It's like being in a sauna all the time at night not pleasant

title: Couldn't wish a nicer family holiday
review: Dear guest. We are deeply sorry fo this inconvnience, specially for your little son. I have received feedback from our hotel Manager, and he had a meeting with you, to try to solve  any problem you could have, including a room change. I hope that you and your son will be able to enjoy your holidays as expected. Don't hesitate to contact us again if you need any further help. Best regards.

title: Excellent
review: We spent 10 days in this lovely hotel.Rooms are simple but nice and clean. Nothing fancy but we didn't care cause usually we don't spend so much time in our room.Good sized balcony also. We had all inclusive and we couldn't fault it.We have never been hungry. Nice salads, lots of choice of mains, soups were really tasty too.Packed lunch was good also plenty of fruits, water, breadroll etc. Drinks, cocktails, sangria etc at the bar is good and we had little snack every day between 4-6pm. There is a free bus service to the centre and takes approximately 10 min. Pool is good, lots of tables and chairs around it. Staff is really really nice, very helpful, hardworking they are really lovely.We had a great time here.Thank you!

title: One week at Hotel Perla Tenerife from Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
review: Dear guest. Thanks for visiting us, and for such a kind review. Reviews like yours encourage us to continue working to improve every day.  Kind regards.

title: Perfectly adequate
review: Fantastic little place! Friendly staff who couldn't do enough for us! Food and drink was lovely and plentiful! Pool was nice! Couldn't ask for more! Thank you very much for a fantastic holiday pearla!

title: Confused card games
review: I am currently here with my husband and 3 children in a two week holiday all going ok but was very confused last night in the bar area . After our evening meal as a family we like to play cards we started playing and the lady behind the bar ran over and said no cards only outside on the terrace . On looking on the terrace there are only approx 12 tables all which were taken so nowhere to go now we were the only ones in the bar no animation taking place sat in the corner causing no bother just wanting a game of pontoon not strip polker . I went to reception to ask the reason why the guy didn't want to talk to me and shrugged me off with a wave of his hand saying rules rules so I'm quite perplexed if anyone can enlighten me 😳😳😳😳😳😳😳

title: great
review: Dear guest. Our Manager would like to contact you, in orrder to explain you the reasons for having this rules. However, we have several spots were it is possible to play cards, if that is what you desire. Please contact with our reception. Best regards.

title: Great value for a 3 star hotel, great food, clean, good size room but rude staff let it down
review: me and my friend (BOTH 18) went all inclusive for 10 nights. it's lovely hotel friendly staff, good range on drinks and the food is okay always something to eat. its a bit of a walk to and from the town but there is a free bus. if you are wanting to go to Las Americos there is a bus that runs and it only cost €9.60. If you are wanting a quite relaxed hoilday then this is the place for you. if you want to go out on nights out and stuff I would say go to Las Americas.overall lovely place and had a great hoilday

title: It's okay...
review: Dear guest. Thanks for your review. We are happy to read that you had a nice stay in our resort. Kind regards.

title: Food was grim, hotel wa adequate
review: I came here with my mum in Early July 2017. The bus drops you off at the back entrance, which is unusual as you have to walk along a kind of gangway which takes you across a valley. Once inside the hotel you find yourself immediately in a corridor of rooms and you have to take the lift to the 5th floor where you'll find the reception.   Reception staff are not helpful or friendly and will not give out any tourist-friendly advice such as how to get around or local events taking place or places of interest to visit.  For this you'll need to get the free bus into town and visit the tourist information centre where they are a lot more helpful.   We stayed on floor 6 which is the same floor as the pool and evening entertainment area. There is no door to the entertainment area and so…

title: Was just what we paid for
review: This hotel is very clean and comfortable don't believe the bad reviews, it's a three star hotel for reason, and I believe it was value for money, the staff where lovely friendly, and helpful, I didn't like sunbeds not being next to pool but there was no room for them and the pool was small, our room was large and very clean and beds where firm but comfortable, as for the food it was just what you expect, there was plenty of choice, the only thing I could say is that it was hard a drink with lunch as they didn't have many staff on (at lunch as they did at dinner) I must say that the some British people (that we saw) are rude and so disrespectful, and definitely should be shamed of their behavior. Anyway it's a lovely town to visit with loads to do and see just be prepared to walk…

title: Fantastic all round service
review: Dear guest. We appreciate your opinion. Thanks for letting us know your experience in our hotel, and we hope to welcome you soon again. Best regards.

title: We had a great time!
review: Staff so friendly and welcoming Santiago on reception couldn't of helped more if he tried food and drinks a plenty. I read reviews after we had booked and paid and expected the worst. Couldn't of been more wrong it was a very pleasant stay and the food was great everybody catered for . I would recommend to anybody

title: Avoid if you dont like Cockrells
review: Dear guest. Thanks for your fantastic and nice opinion. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. Kind regards

title: Worst
review: So many negative reviews for the Perla Tenerife. We are well travelled and booked 2 weeks cheap and cheerful. We have thoroughly enjoyed our stay. My Points are that yes the hotel is a little dated in parts and would benefit from air conditioning in each room other than a ceiling fan. The baths need a non slip mat as it's extremely slippery. Being able to have a coffee after breakfast would be good and not having to wait until 11am. The food although not ala carte was plentiful for all nationalities and there was always something to have. Three staff in the restaurant were worth their weight in gold Delia, a really tall young man and another petite lady with long hair. One bald guy on reception was friendly but all the others were grumpy especially the head waitress and the rest…

title: It's Ok, cheap and basic.
review: We arrived at about 20.45 And the check in was pretty quick. Dinner was still going on so we basically dumped our bags in the room and went to grab some food. The selection isn't great but there are a few familiar things if you're not in to experimenting with your food. They had chicken nuggets, fish fingers, beef slices, soup and then there was local foods like rabbit and different types of rice dishes. If you're a vegetarian then I'm afraid there won't be very much selection for you. The desserts were..interesting. Very tart mousse, a very odd tasting rice pudding, some kinds of very strange cakes. But the ice cream is always safe. Breakfast was ok. Three types of cereals, coco pops, corn flakes and muesli. Loads of meats and cheeses and fresh fruits are available too. I was…

title: Great for the price!
review: Dear guest. We appreciate your feedback, and will take into consideration your comments and suggestions. Receive our apologies for any inconvenience during your stay, and we hope that, overall, you had a nice time in our hotel. Best regards.

title: Stay at your peril.
review: I have just turned from here with my 13yr old son (13th-20th July), with such a mixed bag of reviews I had no idea what to expect but we had no problems at all.  Room was very spacious, cleaned daily. Yes it was very dated but that didn't bother us as we were out all of the time. No air con but this is advertised in their hotel description when you book, ceiling fan was not great but done an ok job. Our room was on the first floor overlooking the gardens and ravine which was a great view, large patio area, I took earplugs after reading about the cockerels and yes there are lots but they didn't wake us at all and we slept til around 830 every morning which is usual for us.  The pool is not that big but my son enjoyed it and it was busy while we were there, it is very deep and not…

title: Great value for money!
review: Dear guest. Thank you for your review. It´s a pleasure to know that you and your son enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks for choosing us, and we hope to see you soon in another occasion. Keep well, and best regards.

title: Very disappointed
review: Room was dated but didn,t matter. Was there 10 days before sheets were changed. One day the dirty towels were hung back up. The next day the cleaner had no towels. The food was worse than basic. The roast beef was so undercooked the gravy was 90% blood. I found small snails in the lettuce. Some of the staff were very friendly and helpful. I enjoyed the cockerels.

title: its basic, what you pay for
review: I tend not to go on other peoples reviews as every persons holiday is different, i cant slate the hotel as much others have. 1 review said you get dropped off at the bottom of hill which made me nervous as i was with my mum and she suffers with her knees, it was literally a 2 min walk to the hotel from were you get dropped off and wasn't half as bad as I thought. The hotel and rooms are really clean and the maids are lovely. Alot of people complain about the cockerels but i can honestly say i didnt hear them, i dont think ive ever stayed anywhere abroad that doesn't have cockerels.  I paid £365 for a week all inclusive including transfer and luggage so wasn't expecting much. The food aint great but you can make a meal ive had better but i paid alot more for it, i did have 2…

title: 3star rating is a push
review: Dear guest. First of all we are deeply sorry that you have not enjoyed your holidays as we would have liked. We apologize for the inconvenience and we will try to improve on the issues mentioned.  Best regards.

title: Get what you pay for
review: Stayed at this hotel the end of June with my partner and a few other couples, only good thing o could say is that the rooms are clean and a certain few bar staff were helpful. Very outdated hotel with minimal choice of all inclusive food, food selections don't go together so if you enjoy curry with mash potato, fish paella and carrots this place is perfect. I enjoyed the wildlife outside our balcony doors except the cockerel that screams at you at 3am and gets louder every hour. All inclusive is on till 11pm but if you are at the bar at 22.50 you won't get served for another drink, entertainment was pretty much the same every night, I'll never be able to listen to despacito again in my life. Pool pictures are deceiving, pool is a lot smaller when you get there, jacuzzi doesn't…

title: Wouldn't return to this hotel
review: Dear guests. We regret that your stay was not as expected. We will take your comments in consideration for future improvements. Thanks for your visit, and best regards.

title: Disappointed and waste of money.
review: Stayed for a week last week. For what we paid we were happy with. We fly all over the world and often stay in 5 star luxury  This wasnt but we wanted a cheap week and that's what we got. Good was adequate, rooms were adequate. We were on floor 5 overlooking the volcano and the sea. Staff were fantastic and everywhere was clean. But dated but again it's what you pay. Only problem was that we landed in the south airport which meant one and a half transfer. Well done to all the staff. By the way all inclusive is only from 11am - 11pm other times you have to pay

title: Best staff you could ask for
review: I arrived here on 5th of July, hotel and room were both amazing for price we paid. Unfortunately my visit has been cut short due to an incident between myself and my partner. The staff could not have been any better considering the situation and I really owe them a massive thank you. Also first holiday I've been on in ages where hotel cocktails weren't machine made for AI. Again thank you for your kindness and support. ❤️

title: My stay at hotel perla
review: Dear guest. It was a pleasure for us to attend you. Thanks for visiting us. Keep well, and kind regards.

title: Worst place I've been!
review: My stay at hotel Perla well the hotel was next to a deep dry river bed with lots of chickens and cockerels running about which you can hear early in the morning the hotel was ok quite old looking rooms where big the food was ok at first salads chicken pork pasta pickled rabbit taste a bit funny but after a few days it got a bit boring all inclusive starts at 11am till 11pm you have to be out of the bar by 12 which I thought was a bit early the drinks were ok but in a plastic cup lol the pool was small and deep not really suitable for small children on a night there was some entertainment dancing karaoke and some different acts which was ok staff where quite friendly and met some nice people there the hotel is on a hill and the sea front is about 20 min walk downhill the beach…

title: Fairly nice hotel
review: Dear guest. We regret that some aspects of our services were not as you expected. We will take note of your remarks in order to improve them. Thanks for your visit, and for sharing your opinion. Best regards.

title: Awful food
review: I would never stay at this hotel again! To start the food is absolutely awful which is either served cold or under cooked. 3 couples survived on chip sandwiches purely because the food was so disgusting. The food didn't go together at all and looked like it had been reheated every couple of days.   The entertainment is the same near enough every night with the same Spanish songs playing I wouldn't advise staying in the hotel at night.   The rooms are completely basic, but clean normally overlooking the chickens which will start screaming at 3am and eventually get louder by 7am.  The lifts in the building are not structurally safe as they appear to drop and leave a trip hazard when stepping out the lift. It also states maximum 6 people in the lift , but a staff member screamed at…

title: Lovely hotel but food terrible
review: The hotel was lovely in a quiet area only 15 min walk into the town all down hill it's quite a hard walk back up but taxi is about €4 . There is a free bus that takes you down into town from mid morning til 6ish in the evening.  The hotel is very clean in all areas the pool is small but great for a quick dip it's on the roof and also a higher roof terrace with sun loungers. The staff are friendly and helpful . Our room was clear and quite big with a balcony some toiletries are proved there a hairdryer and also a fridge which wasn't the coldest but enought to keep some drinks cool we popped to a local supermarket and brought some drinks as the bar shuts at 11pm we could sit on the balcony and have a drink they won't let you take drinks to you room from the bar. I found the beds…

title: It is what it is
review: Dear guest. Thanks for taking your time writing this review. We sincerely regret your disappointment and we hope that you had a nice holiday despite these inconveniences. Best Regards,

title: A bit remote
review: I'm going to be honest, as always. The hotel was lovely and clean and always kept nice. It's basic but just what you need on a couples trip away. Don't expect a wild night life. The area is nice just be prepared for a bit of up hill walking. Bus service was great and regular. Hotel staff were mainly nice. The only thing I can really criticise is the food in the hotel. The meat seemed very cheap, the drinks machine was rubbish and a lot of it was greasy. The chickens will sometimes wake you up.

title: Not quite a pearl!
review: Dear guest. Thank you for your review. We´ll try to improve on these points you mentioned. We apologize for any inconvenience. Best regards

title: OK
review: Was dropped off and walked about 100 yards up the road to the footbridge across the ravine to the hotel which led to the lifts on the 1st floor. The reception is on the 5th floor and was met by a rather rude male receptionist, After booking in we were give 2 door cards but only one card for all inclusive, I asked for another card for my partner but was told only one card per room. While I was talking to receptionist another  guest came up and talked in Spanish to him, even though I was still talking he blanked me and talked to guest, when I said I was still talking, both of the ignored me and carried on talking. The one card  created problems as my partner likes to lounge by the pool and I like to sit in the bar, sometimes. So it was a matter of looking for each other to get the…

title: Much better than I anticipated
review: So we booked that place last minute, at lunch to stay there that night. We'd been staying on a resort down on the south coast for a week, but had the last 2 nights free to go wherever we pleased. The hotel was fantastically kitsch, with decor from the 1970s, but very fetching for it. The real highlight is their ravine garden, really beautiful flowers and plants - totally unique. Half of the corridor to our room was a rock face!!! Wicked, like walking in Echo Base on Hoth. Breakfast was included, really good. Big buffet selection - I was happy with 3 types of egg, bacon, cheese. (Proper), wife was impressed with their 6 types of salt and 10 types of olive oil. Really great.  There's a lovely pool and sun-deck on the roof, with great views of the mountains and down to the sea. It…

title: Girls break
review: Dear guest. We appreciate very much your review, and it makes us happy to read that you enjoyed your stay in our house. We can only be proud receiving such nice comments, and we can only say....may the force be with you, always ! ;)

title: Extremely poor hotel all round
review: Just came home from spending 5 days and 5 nights here at the Perla hotel Tenerife, some good points. Some bad but overall it was OK! Firstly the area (if you haven't been before). It's super far from the airport (1hr 30 drive) in a bus to Puerto de la Cruz, and then a taxi back from the centre. (We were lucky that a tour bus had loads of room left and took us for cheap). The bus is €13.55 taxi is roughly €5. Many operators do not have transfers here, as it's so far away! The town itself is very quiet - 5-10 min walk into the town, you have things like MCD, ice cream parlours, touristic shops, in the evening a few discos open (we have just come back and it's low season so not much was happening AT ALL, however from what I've heard that doesn't change much!), we visited a nice…

title: Disappointed
review: Dear guests. We appreciate very much this feedback, and are grateful for taking your valuable time by writing this comprehensive review. We regret those aspects that were not as you expected, and we want you to receive our most sincere apologies. Overall we are glad that you enjoyed your stay in our island. Best regards.

title: Quiet Holiday in the Sun
review: Just returned from this hotel, food was cold all the time so was unclear how long it had sat before being put out, only hot thing was soup, when I complained they pointed towards the queue for a small microwave to re-heat the food, and quality is poor.  Entertainment consisted of Spanish music for the elderly Spanish clientele and the hotel is full of Spaniards between October to end of May due to Spanish government. Hotel reminded us of 1970's, from the decor and furnishings are from the period, both barmen we saw were extremely miserable towards anyone not Spanish- I tried to chat to some of the Spaniards as I like to get along with everyone but was cut dead most of time. We won't be going back to Spain in future. Lager was OK but all inclusive local spirits were only fit to…

title: Awesome place to stay
review: This place is great for food and staff  brill go all inclusive they serve your wine by the bottle not glass.  The location is good, and theres a free bus to the front.  Hire a car from plus cars at the airport, no credit card just debit and no deposit we paid only 89 euros with full insurance cover for 7 days.  Awesome

title: dont go
review: Dear guest. we appreciate your feedback, and are happy to read you had a pleasant stay in our hotel. Thank for choosing us, and best regards.

title: The worst hotel ever
review: chips with xmas dinner food terrible chips with everything new year dinner was a bit better, but entertainment rubbish for new year had to pay for drink after 11pm thought they might of give us a couple of drinks to take the new year in but no room wanted a face lift infact whole hotel could do with one, very rude staff on reception

title: Holiday review
review: Dear guest. We regret that your stay was not as expected. I suppose that you had booked in all inclusive. This service ends at 11 pm daily. After that time ( even in Christmas ) all drinks are payable. You should have this information in your travel documentation. Friendly regards.

title: Average. Random. Stuck in old ways to suit the older generation
review: We arrived around 9pm no food or drink available the hotel was very dated the rooms where a mess we asked for a double room we got two single beds we told the reception promised to move us they moved us into another twin room with the bed strapped together using a towel  The lift is dangerous we stayed in this hotel one night and moved into a different hotel with no refund nothing not very helpful staff no entertainment we were all inclusive but bar stops serving at 10 although we couldn't get a drink at 9pm  The food is disgusting

title: great value for money
review: good clean hotel.staff are very polite and helpful.food and restaurant was lovely.we enjoyed a good relaxing holiday and will book again.not so good for children.great views from sun loungers on the roof.pool was fine.

title: Good Week
review: Dear guests. We appreciate your feedback, and also wish to welcome you again in the next future. Kind regards.

title: Great
review: Excellent hotel based on cost. Exceeded my expectations. Food was very good and no complaints. All inclusive holiday. Cockerels others complained about could hardly be heard within the rooms and certainly not during sleep.  Staff were all polite and helpful.Service was good at all times. Rooms were clean and were kept clean by the excellent cleaning staff. Would recommend but set your expectations at the right level for the price you are paying. This is not a five star hotel but a good holiday hotel.

title: Well..
review: Dear guests. We are pleased to receive your objective opinion about our hotel and our services. Thanks for choosing us, and we hope to welcome you again in the next future. Best regards.

title: Good relaxing week
review: Went for a week with my fella really enjoyed it room was big and spotless also hotel. Food was not great though not much choice and not to my taste. Most people looked like they were enjoying it. The Cockerels didn't bother us at all. The staff are really good. Fella went to look for a shop in the middle of the night and got lost the receptionist took me to find him👍👍👍👍which I greatly appreciated. It's a 5-10 minute walk to the town centre. Apart from the food I loved it.

title: Average
review: We were a little dubious with so many negative reviews!  We had a room on the road side and didn't hear a single cockerel the whole time! We had actually bought ear plugs just incase!  The bar staff were at times quite grumpy and rude but other times nice! The restaurant staff just seemed ran off their little feet but helpful if you could get hold of one!   The food was ok - always found something we could eat, not the best quality but was fine! I think is depends on expectations- we didn't pay much so weren't too bothered!  We had a hire car - we went out each day touring the beautiful island and would take the bread rolls, cheese and ham from breakfast and make a little packed lunch for the day.   The room was dated but spacious and clean. We didn't even use the pool or sun…

title: Good Staff, OK hotel
review: Dear guest. We appreciate your objective opinion of our hotel, and are glad that you had a pleasant time in our island.  Best regards, and looking forward to see you soon again.

title: Good hotel, but it lacks 'something'
review: The hotel runs a shuttle into town that finishes about 6-7pm, otherwise walking into town is ok but uphill back is a challenge. As a holiday town, there seems to be little going on. We went into town on a Friday evening and it wasn’t pumping at all, boring in fact. Maybe we were too early? All the attractions were at the other end of the island. So you have a couple of choices, rent a car, take the 2hr coach ride. We did the latter and were on the coach as long as we were on the boat [to see dolphins and whales]. If I were to go again, I’d book a hotel to the south of the island for sure. The island itself was very clean and looked well maintained; roads seem good too.  The hotel could do with some money being spent but its ok. If you think budget hotel, not luxury, you’ll be…

title: Amazing calm hotel
review: Dear Guest. Dispite the lack of entertainment, we hope you enjoyed your stay in our resort. Thanks for visiting us. Best regards.

title: Lovely
review: The transfer coach -or any coach or bus for that matter- cannot drop off at hotel so we had to walk a short distance , in the dark, its not made very clear that reception is on the 5th floor, so a group of us wandered around with cases on the ground floor like lost souls- well I guess we were. Eventually we found reception, check-in was very quick and easy. Our room was on the bottom floor, a little concerned about security, we asked reception about a safe to deposit our passports etc, we were quoted a ridiculous price, plus a deposit, so we declined and had to carry our passports everywhere with us. We stayed one week and overall quite enjoyed the stay, but, we found the food rather bland and tasteless and despite being AI we ate out a couple of times to get tasty food. The…

title: Good Holiday
review: The staff on reception where very help full and very good with a wi-fi problem.There is a 10 euro charge for one week for one tablet/phone/laptop,the wi-fi  speed is very good. The staff in the restaurant we all very happy and help full. The food was very good although not a vast choice there was always something tasty available. The food was served at a good temperature. As mentioned elsewhere there is noise from the local cockerel chorus but you soon get used to it Value for money was very good. We hired a car from the South airport and it was an easy drive to the hotel. There is a sign in the bar saying no card games allowed. Overall well recommended.

title: Nice time
review: Dear guest. Thanks for your recommendation. We look forward to welcome you again in the next future. Best regards.

title: You get what you pay for
review: We had very nice experience. In my opinion we get exactly what we paid for. Food was tasty .It is very nice that you give bottle of wine or beer with the meals I still remember one waitress who always smile and was very polite to us .Many people was smiling and happy to help and give advise Is look like you care about entertainment for tourists ,I saw a lots of nice live concerts during my visit. Room always clean and tidy. In our opinion you should have free wi-fi for quest.For the future think about something small for kids; )greetings for Kiko very nice to meet this funny guy.

title: holiday or hell
review: Dear guest. We appreciate your comments, and are happy to read that you had a nice time in our hotel. Your suggestions will surely help us to improve in the next future. Kind regards.

title: Short break
review: Just returned from a week away with friends to celebrate a birthday. The food was basic but of a decent standard and all of us managed to find something to eat at meal times. The rooms where a nice size cleaned every day and the sheets and towels changed but the mattresses were a little uncomfortable but you get used to it. The hotel staff on a whole were friendly and very helpful and the bar staff even more so especially Pablo who put up with us every night

title: Lovely.
review: Here currently and loving it. The cockerels don't bother us and the location is pretty nice. The only downside is the beds. The bed is super hard and not good on my pregnant self's back lol. Everything is super clean and there's a good selection of food at each meal. we have enjoyed each meal so far. Reception is also very friendly and very helpful!

title: I like it !
review: Dear guest. We regret the inconvenience with your mattress, although we have recently changed all the mattresses of our hotel. I hope our reception has arranged it to help you in this issue. Best regards, and thanks for your visit.

title: Happy days
review: I feel happy and relaxed after 4 days at Pearla Tenerife. Lovely loction. Great view from  the roof. Perfect short break for me and my dauther .Very nice staff in a restaurant.  We  will never forgett roosters :))

title: Would love to visit a third time
review: Dear guest. Despite the inconvenience with the roosters we have near the hotel, we are happy to read that you had a pleasant stay. Best regards.

title: Short stay
review: Was I guess a little concerned with some negative comments. Great hotel all staff were excellent and if you asked for anything you recieved. Beer good and 3 meals a day c'mon how can anybody moan at that plenty of choice too. Was not just fish and chicken as others have commented, pork, roast beef and red wine at lunch and dinner. If the cockeralls bothered you just drink more free beer and sleep through it.

title: SO FAR SO GOOD!
review: Been here 2 days and it's beautiful! Weather is promising for Feb visitors! All inclusive local beer is amazing as is the local vodka! Entertainment of the evening hosted by Yanira is amazing and she tries to get everyone involved! All bar staff are incredible already know what I'm drinking as if I was in my local pub! All other staff are so polite and lovely. Defiantly a place I would come again 10 more nights to enjoy in this hotel ❤️ ❤️

title: Short trip
review: Dea guest. Thanks for your nice opinion. We hope you enjoy the rest of your stay, even more than the first 2 days. Best regards.

title: One week in January, all inclusive
review: Just enjoyed a short break at this hotel very clean spacious rooms  food OK  excellent customer service  a bit out of town but 5 euros in  a taxi be prepaired for early morning weakening call from the chickens would recommend for a cheap break

title: 80s timewarp hotel complete with cockerel chorus
review: Dear guest. Thanks for your opinion. We hope to see you soon again. Best regards.

title: My time
review: Hotel was fine. Staff were lovely, rooms clean. Only problem for me was as a vegetarian there were only two main meal times in the whole week where a vegetrarian option was offered. Ok, salad, chips...olives...but nothing else on main course. Even the soup was fish or chicken. Ok, if not a vegeatarian, and otherwise, a good value hotel, good surroundings, friendly staff.

title: Bridging the winter gap
review: An all-inclusive deal for some winter sunshine and warmth. The hotel was fairly busy but the staff, we found, were attentive and obliging at all times. We arrived from Tenerife South airport on a transfer but had a walk of about 200 yards to the "Bridge of the Rumbling Suitcases" as large vehicles can't drive up there. Not a problem. A meal was there for us by reception which is on the 5th floor! Don't panic!! There are lifts. The room was functional with a view across the "Ravine of Cockerels" to some vibrant and colourful vegetation. The free-range poultry is everywhere in the area and the birds roost in the trees around. We never saw any cats so these may be the local equivalent of pest-control!  The pool and lounging areas are wind-protected and the views are great. The pool…

title: Great for families... except you can't have inflatables in the pool
review: Dear guests. We really enjoyed reading your review. Thanks for these nice comments. We hope to see you again in the next future. Kind regards, and keep well.

title: Very friendly hotel
review: We loved staying here.. the walkway from the road in to the back is a bit like the i'm a celebrity bridge so it was fun and one day we could see loads of goats walking in the ravine below... it was really nice!  The food is of excellent quality and lots of choice although the waiting staff only tend to offer to bring you one drink as they sit you down.  Pool area clean and there is entertainment in the evenings although a bit limited.  Children weren't allowed to take inflatables in the pool any bigger than arm bands so that could be a problem for some.  Rooms clean and aircon is really good.  Lots of roosters around the property so if you want total peace and quiet in the morning in particular this may not be the place for you but it just blended in to the atmospheric sound for…

title: Dont do it!!!!!!
review: Dear guest. Thanks for your nice review. We regret that you had this inconvenience with our pool rules, but we have to respect all guests, and inflatables can be a bit annoying for the rest of clients. Overall, we are happy you had a nice stay, and will look forward to welcome you in another ocassion. Best regards, and have a happy year 2017.

title: "Shambles"
review: Great small hotel, staff are very friendly and helpful,  food is average, the hotel is clean would definitely stay here again, only bad points are the Cockerells in the morning but you get used to it, it is about 15 minutes walk downhill to the town which is steep but they do provide a free bus, I think some of the bad reviews on here are very unfair and looking forward to coming here again

title: Fantastic-o !!
review: This was a very good holiday - we went there July 2016 (myself and partner in our mid 20's). There was a good mix of ages, mix of music to suit all.  The view from the balcony was nice. Was good quality for the price. The main town was close - couple of mins away. Cars are quite cheap to hire.  Would have been good to ave air con though. Receptionist David made us feel very welcome.

title: poor
review: Dear guests. We are glad you had a pleasant stay in our house. Thanks for your opinion, and have a nice year 2017.

title: 2nd stay was even better
review: This hotel was not what it said on the tin....  Pampers to the spanish.. caters for the Germans... English last. All inclusive is restricted from 11-11 with no snacks available during the day... unless there are a few pastries left from breakfast.. no kettle in the room  shock horror!!!   Entertainment is very poor for English as we were referred to often.  We went for our wedding anniversary... and regretted it... If we had the funds we would have booked elsewhere within hours of arriving. Some staff nice but not all... The two highlights re hotel are... the rooms were spotless so thumbs up to the cleaning staff and there was a bidet which is a personal thing of mine.  The boiler had a routine maintenance so no showers for two evenings... water went off at 9am . We will never…

title: The type of hotel that does not even ask you if you had a good stay, because they know nobody does!
review: Dear guest. We regret taht your stay was not as expected. However, all the agencies we collaborate with, have an exhaustive All Inclusive description. It's schedule, and what's included. We have no kettles in the room, but if you had asked at the reception, we usually have available (upon request and availability).  Refering your problem with the shower, i can only send you my most sincere apologies. I am sure that our staff has done everything possible to fix this problem asap. Best regards, and have a nice 2017.

title: Mr Ian Ibbitson
review: Stayed 15 nights for Christmas and New Year with my wife as we enjoyed the Perla last year at the same time. The staff at reception were very friendly and helpful as last time.   We were happy with our room (425) which was large and clean  and our beds were very comfortable. We'd asked to be next to the barranco (ravine) and knew to expect the sound of the many cockerels that start at around 4am. All part of the experience for us but others mights want to ask for a room on the other side of the hotel.  We were all inclusive but only took breakfast and dinner and were happy with the choices and always found something good to eat. The Christmas and New Year dinners were really good and even better than last year.   The hotel is in a very quiet area about 20 minutes walk from the…

title: Disappointment
review: We were expecting for something else after we 've seen the pictures. Awful smell in the hotel. Old and bad equipped. Internet wi fi didn't work in the room, even if we paid for it. We 'll never come back!

title: Winter Sun - A little Jem
review: Dear guest. We are deeply sorry that you have not enjoyed your holidays as we would have liked. Please, receive our apologies for these inconveniences. Your review will be directly redirected to the management of the hotel. Best regards.

title: fantastic holiday
review: Returned last week after a lovely 9 day break, the Hotel is in a quieter area of the town (cockerels excluded!) Our room was spacious and very clean.Staff are helpful and friendly. there is a variety of food to suit all tastes  - beautiful selection of breads and salads, It was great to have long set meal times eg dinner 6 - 9. Very accommodating features such as if were going to out all day you could request a picnic lunch or a late supper if you let them know the previous day. Hope to return.

title: Awful
review: Dear gust. Thanks for your review. We are glad to know that you probably will return to our hotel. That is our best achievement. Unfortunately, the cockerels are in a natural spot, and are part of the local fauna :) Best regards.

title: Cock A Doodle Doo
review: just came back from a two week holiday with my partner ,the hotel is in an excellent location only a 15 min walk to the center or u can catch the free bus from the round about very handy ,the staff is very friendly and helpful , the food is very good and the all inclusive bar very good, loved the swimming pool and the sunbeds which are located on the top of the hotel all in all i can,t fault anything about this hotel i would return any time

title: Time together
review: A relatively small hotel in a quiet area of the town catering mainly for senior couples. Small outdoor pool and rooftop solarium were the best features-and the free bus into the shopping centre. Staff were friendly enough,but for evening entertainment you wanted to go out unless of course you enjoyed football or boardgames. Disappointed with the food selection..The basic fayre very rarely changed and I even  found myself eating chicken nuggets for an evening meal one night.Our all -inclusive wasn't exactly that-try to get water between 10.am(breakfast finishing and 11.am(all inclusive starting)-cheaper to walk to the local shop and buy there. The hotel and rooms are tired and in our room the bathroom ceiling tiles in disrepair,but the maids kept our beds made and supplied fresh…

title: Short but sweet stay
review: Dear guests. We appreciate your feedback. We will take note of your comments, in order to analyze future improvements. Thanks for your visit.

title: brilliant
review: I'm rating it 3 stars because that's what it is. The hotel was very very basic but had nothing to fault therefore its standard and the upkeep and cleaning service was very good. The staff were on the whole very friendly with the occasional moody bloke. The buffet was very good and was often a good variation of food. Breakfast was always a fry up however and the options for vegetarians were limited-just fruit and bread. The entertainment was poor and consisted of just one or two ladies trying to get people to dance in a very small area. Overall if you are looking for a cheap and cheerful stay I would recommend, if you expect it to go above and beyond then you'll be disappointed!

title: Paddy murphy
review: Dear guest. Thanks for sharing your opinion. We aprreciate your feedback, and are happy to read that overall you enjoyed your stay. Kind regards.

title: we will return
review: Had a lovely week 23rd October food very good drinks not watered down best all inclusive i have stayed in staff friendly, room just for shower and sleep sofa bed was a bit lumpy needs a new mattress but i put the blankets out of the  wardrobe on top of mattress did the trick slept well chickens not a problem entertainment not very good young girl tries hard but she needs to research what the British like music wise y m c a bit dated more Spanish fun than British although there were more Brits staying there that week Pueto del la cruz lovely place hotel only ten fifteen mins walk there is a free bus which we got going back as bit uphill walk also taxi was cheep we liked pueto more than south clean green less crowded but each to his taste

title: Wouldnt return
review: I found reception rude from the day we arrived to the day we enquired about our pick up time to take us to the airport home. The long haired reception guy just raised his eyebrows and shrugged his shoulders because he didnt have our info. We found a web address and checked ourselves. Areas around the hotel clean but needed updating. Beds were all ways clean. (Thank you to the maids. Great job). Lovely and quite at night, when the entertainment had finished. Karaoke was so bad you had to laugh!!! The cockrels didnt really csuse a problem because i had ear plugs :).All inclusive  not until 11am. The reason people choose this is to be able to get a drink at any time. Hmm food not really that good. Seemed to have meat but nothing that actually went with it, unless you had fries.…

title: What a Perla Poo
review: Smashing friendly hotel. Great food , very clean all areas. Swimming pool not suitable for children. All the staff could not do enough to make your holiday.  Yanra kept us all happy with her evening entertainment.

title: Great Holiday nice hotel
review: Dear guest. Thanks for sharing your opinion with us. It's a pleasure to receive your comments, and we look forward to welcome you soon again. Kind regards.

title: Very Enjoyable Holiday
review: We stayed at this hotel for 10 nights in October 2016. Our daily routine began by the morning vocals of the cockerels at about 4-5 in the morning and if we weren't woken up by the cockerels it was by the huge amount of ants crawling all over us. But I can't complain about free alarms? Who wants to relax on holiday? I loved the gaping holes in the bathroom tiles, it was so good to see that the maintenance hadn't spoilt things by making unnecessary repairs. I loved eating Wednesdays freshly made breakfast and actually eating it on Friday. On the second day I broke my tooth on a staple in the food. They gave us a bottle of champagne to say sorry but this doesn't make up for it.  We took the long trip in to town on the free shuttle, which was driven by a furiously angry man who…

title: Great Hotel
review: For a 3* hotel this is great value as the food is good. The rooms are clean and spacious. The staff are very friendly.  If I go back to Puerto de la Cruz I would easily stay here.  It's a bit of a walk to the sea front but there is a courtesy bus laid on. We never used it as the exercise walking back up the hill was very useful, due to the nice food and drinks at the hotel 😊

title: A really good stay
review: Dear guest. Thanks for staying with us. We work hard to make our guests happy and appreciate your feedback!

title: Not bad but wouldn't return
review: We had an excellent two weeks here. I don't know why some people feel they have to misrepresent this hotel, as much of the negative comment is, in my opinion, totally untrue. So to put some things into perspective....We had good food for the full two weeks with plenty of choice each evening (we didn't lunch here even though we were AI). Food was never cold. There were vegetables available every sitting. There was a different home-made soup each day. Admittedly, the second week, some of the dishes available were the same as week one, but this is to be expected. I would estimate that each night, there was a choice of at least two meats, sometimes more, together with fish or pasta etc. There was always fresh fruit available.   Breakfast was good with all the ingredients for a "Full…

title: Very acceptable, we'd come again.
review: The hotel is very clean and just up the hill from Peurto de la Cruz town centre, where all bars and shops are so location quite good.  The bed's were 2 singles instead of the double ordered and rock hard, never had decent sleep for the entire week.  The food was quite good, good choice and tasty, came with beer or wine at table.  The staff where friendly enough but hard to deal with at times.  Worst example was we where attempting to get the pack lunch for days out as part of all inclusive.  My mrs went the restaurant and reception over a few days and was at each request sent back and forth between the two being to to ask the waiter/receptionist for it, we just gave up.  Bar and entertainment basic but good.  It was impossible to get any water on the all inclusive outside…

title: Holiday
review: Lovely hotel, staff very helpful, polite , rooms cleaned daily . Comfortable bed . Entertainment fun to watch children, unable to join in unfortunately. Yanira the entertainer tried hard to get all involved. Quite hilly around hotel, taxis reasonable to get around also free bus into town

title: Bit disappointed
review: Dear guest. Thanks for staying with us. We work hard to make our guests happy and appreciate your feedback! Kind regards.

title: We had a lovely relaxing stay here, hotel was very clean, staff very friendly and helpful
review: Good points  Very clean hotel and area Pool clean but small and very cold Always something you could eat Quiet area Free bus to sea front Staff friendly and helpful Drinks good   Bad points  Many rooms very noisy – cockerels, early morning deliveries etc.  Food rather repetitive and never hot No entertainment except bingo and a poor disco Pool very small and quite deep Sun loungers up a level from the pool Nothing to eat between meals except pastries from 4 – 6 pm.  Information said “kettle in the room” but there wasn’t.  The hotel is in need of some updating but was very clean and in a nice quiet area.  It is a 3 star but only just.   The hotel is on a hill and has a lot of steps inside so not suitable for anyone with mobility problems.  When you arrive you will be dropped at a…

title: "Food always cold "
review: Dear guest. Thank you for your visit and your comments. We will take advice of the issue with the temperature of the food, and i will forward this information to the Food & Beverages Manager to fix this as soon as possible. Receive our most sincere apologies.

title: Don't believe all youread
review: when we arrived we was a bit apprehensive about being dropped of at the roundabout, and no clear instructions how to get to reception. once checked in we found the rooms to be basic, patio area to be small, but hey this was a cheap get away. the location is not to bad its a 15/20 min stroll into town, walking up is a bit more challenging but overall the hotel was very clean the food was good for a three star, and the Bar staff was great, all very welcoming, didn't really like the bar closing at 11pm but i guess they have to have some cut of time, all in myself and partner had a comfortable stay. this is really a adults hotel i do not personal think its child friendly, as lots of steps and the pool is not suitable for children. But thank you Perla for a very enjoyable stay. your…

title: Clean but would not return
review: I understand that this hotel was part of a deal and therefore we had not paid a lot for it but unfortunately, Hotel Perla was not up to scratch in my opinion.  Firstly the positives  The hotel was kept very clean. The rooms were cleaned daily and the communal areas and dining facilities were well maintained.  The staff were very pleasant. We had a translation issues a couple of times but the staff certainly tried thier best to make our stay a pleasant one!  We were all inclusive and the drinks service at the bar was good. However, it was a little annoying that you could not recieve drinks until after 11am.  This is the first all inclusive hotel that i have stayed in has had this policy. I certainly wasn't after alcohol at this time but as me and my friend are quite early risers…

title: Don't believe all you read
review: Dear guest. We regret that your stay was not satisfactory. In any case we will take note of your remarks and try to improve the issues that you`ve detailed. Thank you for your opinion.

title: A nice friendly clean hotel
review: Well how can I explain this hotel. Stayed for a week sept 8th-15th 2016 and in this hotel that was to long. On first arrival we was allocated room 101 which lasted for about 5 mins, after entering the room I soon made my way back to reception demanding a Room change to which I was told the hotel was full but within a few minutes a room was found on level 2. I'm sure every new arrival gets allocated that room to see who doesn't complain. title: dont trust
review: we stayed at the hotel perla last week from the 6th -13th September What can we say about the Hotel Perla Tenerife? To start with the staff were fantastic. We arrived just before midnight on the 6th and David who was on reception was great. Once we were checked in, he opened up the restaurant for us so we could have a bite to eat. From there the staff continued to be great. They were all friendly and the cleaning staff cleaned our room daily we have no complaints what so ever about the hotel. Staff deserve a massive raise!!!! Food wise, we aren’t looking for full English meals every day so the food was varied as well.  The food on offer was good with such items as veal and rabbit being local delicacies included Beer wise. It was cold, so it was good in the 30+ degree heat. One…

title: No upgrades availiable
review: Just arrived home from this hotel today and when speaking to the receptionist we were told there was no room upgrades so don't get sucked in and pay for one. There is no room with pool view. Hotel is clean and basic but on the plus side can get a sunbed at any time of day. Food good and the usual choices but I would say this hotel is not suitable for anyone wanting nightlife or disabled people .lost our I pad thought we d left in room but when got home and rang up no sign of it, mystery!!  The staff are all very friendly and try their hardest to accommodate . Over a hundred steps if try walking back up the hill, but a lovely tapas bar on way up if you need a drink. And not forgetting the cockerels in the garden be prepared to be woken early

review: You will read a variety of reviews about this hotel what I will say is I write fair reviews.  If you are willing to go with the flow and embrace the experience you will totally enjoy this hotel. So the food each day is a discovery to see what is out you can be guaranteed fresh fruit  along with a cooked breakfast / croissants and pastries lunch is salad and some hot dishes which vary and dinner is the same there is soup offered with both lunch and dinner. All is of a good standard maybe not cooked to the way everyone cooks however the food is kept hot and replenished when required. Drinks during…

review: Do not stay at this hotel if you are English and prepared to be treated badly and rude by staff and the many Spanish people who stay in large groups every week end , stayed here with my partner in late August bedding wasn't changed every day, towels were folded to look like clean but on opening was dirty from the day before, the food was appalling slop, and many people was ill , one morning got up for breakfast went to the half eaten tray of bread for toast and found it had been turned up side down to hide the furry mould on the bottom ate out 9 nights of our all inclusive two wk stay. title: Holiday
review: I read all the bad reviews and all the good reviews with this hotel and I always reserve judgement until I have experienced the hotel myself. I must say that I wish I had taken more notice of the bad reviews as I have never experience such a bad hotel. I paid my travel company for a room upgrade only to be told by a very rude receptionist that there is no such thing as a room upgrade? Rooms very old and dated. Fridge doesn't work, toilet doesn't flush, tv makes a piercing loud pitch noise and the best is the beds smell of urine...  I complained and asked for an upgraded room ( although I…

title: Quiet week away
review: On arrival at 3am I was a little shocked to find that transfer buses can't get with in a 5 minute walk up the hill. But once you've worked out the buzzer and through the broken English you need to find a lift and get to the 5th floor to check in. But after that apart from having 1 plug socket in the room witch the TV used the staff sorted an extension cable for us very quickly so the wife's hair straighteners could work. Happy days  The hotel was very clean as there seemed to be cleaners everywhere, the food was limited but what was on offer tasted great. The swimming pool was small and deep it was too small to chill out when kids are try to dive in everywhere. Nothing much of a nightlife unless you love karaoke. All the staff were good and helpful and I've got to say a big…

title: Best hotel in this residential area
review: We stayed for 4 nights in August and found the hotel to be clean, quiet and a pleasant enough place to crash. We didn't spend any time at the hotel during the day or evenings as we were down in the town exploring or at Lago Martianez (a must visit!) and the evening entertainment looked rather limited and a bit dull for a couple in their late 20s.   We ate breakfast most mornings and it was fine and we had dinner their once which again was perfectly edible. The all inclusive beer was nice too !   Its a nice easy 15/20 downhill walk to the beach/strip of restaurants and a further 10 to the busy town square. We enjoyed this walk every day and it's under 4 euros in a taxi for the uphill return leg.  In summary I would recommend this hotel to people wanting somewhere to crash who…
